entities.name: o.w.l.s
entities.description: The name of the exam that Harry and Ron are taking. (Excerpt: 'O.W.L.S')

entities.name: anthony goldstein
entities.description: A student who had already been tested for O.W.L.S. (Excerpt: 'Anthony Goldstein, Gregory Goyle, and Daphne Greengrass.')

entities.name: gregory goyle
entities.description: A student who had already been tested for O.W.L.S. (Excerpt: 'Anthony Goldstein, Gregory Goyle, and Daphne Greengrass.')

entities.name: daphne greengrass
entities.description: A student who had already been tested for O.W.L.S. (Excerpt: 'Anthony Goldstein, Gregory Goyle, and Daphne Greengrass.')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also taking the exam. (Excerpt: 'Students who had already been tested did not return afterward...')

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story and a student taking the O.W.L.S. exam. (Excerpt: 'Potter, Harry.')

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also taking the exam. (Excerpt: 'Harry and Ron had no idea how Hermione had done...')

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is calling out students for their exams. (Excerpt: 'Professor Flitwick called, “Parkinson, Pansy — Patil, Padma — Patil, Parvati — Potter, Harry.”')

entities.name: professor tofty
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is conducting the O.W.L.S. exam. (Excerpt: 'Professor Tofty is free, Potter...')

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A student who is also taking the exam and being tested by Professor Marchbanks. (Excerpt: 'who was halfway through testing Draco Malfoy.')

relationships.description: Professor Tofty is conducting Harry's O.W.L.S. exam. (Excerpt: 'Professor Tofty is free, Potter...')
Harry and Hermione are taking the same exam. (Excerpt: 'Students who had already been tested did not return afterward...')
Ron and Harry are taking the same exam. (Excerpt: 'Harry and Ron had no idea how Hermione had done...')
Professor Flitwick is calling out students for their exams, including Harry. (Excerpt: 'Professor Flitwick called, “Parkinson, Pansy — Patil, Padma — Patil, Parvati — Potter, Harry.”')
Professor Marchbanks is conducting Draco's O.W.L.S. exam. (Excerpt: 'who was halfway through testing Draco Malfoy.')
